p.s: The novel The Hate U Give, written by George Tillmann Jr. has difference between the book and the film.
One thing is that in this scene Maverick is fighting with King but in the book he is arguing with Mr. Lewis.
Another thing is that in the movie he is eating dinner with his family but in the book he is working in his store.
The exact purpose of the scene is that police violence is really bad and also brutally.
In the film is this aspect more shown because you can see the facial expression of the character.
One thing which is really suspicious as I said at the beginning is that though one of the police officers is black he treats Maverick very brutally.
All in all I would say that the film is better than the novel.
